briefTitle: Study of the Safety of Use of Intravitreal SOK583A1 Provided in a Vial Kit
officialTitle: An Open-label, Single-arm, Multicenter Study in Patients With Neovascular Age-related Macular Degeneration to Evaluate the Safety of SOK583A1 (40 mg/mL), a Proposed Aflibercept Biosimilar Product, Provided in a Vial Kit
summary: This is a single-arm, open-label study where all patients will receive a single injection of SOK583A1 (40 mg/mL) provided in a vial kit at Baseline. The total study duration for the individual participant is approximately 31 days.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Ocular Treatment Emergent Adverse Events
